author: Anonymous Scale
title: Lecture question
question: Hi, this is the program we did in lecture, the compound data for the spider, I'm confused why we need to do CTR-X twice? I know the second one, like CTR-X 21, but I don't know why we need to add CTR-X 0, could someone please explain what does that represent? Thanks!
student_answer:
@6
but that's because of how the add-line function works. It's drawing a line from the top center of the screen to the ctr-x at the spider's location.
